excerpt: "The Good Face Project (GFP) is one of the most trusted resource worldwide for fact-checking toxic and unsafe ingredients in skincare, makeup, hair, baby products and more. Good face employs the latest science combined with artificial intelligence to analyze product formulations using the most up-to-date publicly available scientific research to provide consumers with an independently validated and fact-based safety guide."
